options.fig.cap: Three simulations of a logistic population growth model. The top-left graph shows a population at stable equilibrium where N0 = 0 (this is the trivial solution). The other two plots show how, independent of N0, they both reach an equilibrium at K = 100. Notice how N0 = 1 takes more time to reach equilibrium than N0 = 75
options.label: unnamed-chunk-46
